<?php
/*PLEASE DO NOT EDIT THIS CODE*/
/*This code was generated using the UMPLE @UMPLE_VERSION@ modeling language!*/

class Student
{

  //------------------------
  // MEMBER VARIABLES
  //------------------------

  //Student Attributes
  private $number;

  //Student Associations
  private $mentor;

  //Helper Variables
  private $canSetNumber;
  private $canSetMentor;

  //------------------------
  // CONSTRUCTOR
  //------------------------

  public function __construct($aNumber, $aMentor)
  {
    $this->number = $aNumber;
    $this->canSetNumber = false;
    $this->canSetMentor = true;
    if (!$this->setMentor($aMentor))
    {
      throw new Exception("Unable to create Student due to aMentor");
    }
  }

  //------------------------
  // INTERFACE
  //------------------------

  public function getNumber()
  {
    return $this->number;
  }

  public function getMentor()
  {
    return $this->mentor;
  }

  private function setMentor($newMentor)
  {
    $wasSet = false;
    if (!$this->canSetMentor) { return $wasSet; }
    $this->canSetMentor = false;

    if ($newMentor != null)
    {
      $this->mentor = $newMentor;
      $wasSet = true;
    }
    return $wasSet;
  }

  public function equals($compareTo)
  {
    return $this == $compareTo;
  }

  public function delete()
  {}

}
?>
